section.name: Bluefin
section.p: Welcome to the Bluefin Project! This is an open-source project being developed by PayPal Selenium enthusiasts. The libraries are split into Bluefin-Core and Bluefin-Gui. Core library contains the essential utilities to build out tests. The Bluefin Gui library contains the page declarations for test writers to interface with the page elements.

ul.li: What is Bluefin? - An overview of what Bluefin is, as well as what Bluefin is not.
Creating Bluefin Development Environment - Instructions on how to create a build environment for Java with Eclipse as the IDE. This will allow you to write Java test-cases that use Bluefin.
Setup a Java Project that uses Bluefin using maven archetype. - Instructions to setup a sample setup of a Java project which is able to utilize the functions in Bluefin.
Contributing to Bluefin - Learn how you can contribute to Bluefin!
